public void callSearchIndex(java.util.ArrayList<java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String>> queryList)

writeSearchResults

public boolean writeSearchResults()
Iterates through the HashMap of stored results and writes them to the file searchresults.txt. Returns true if it successful writes to the file, else writes a error message and returns false. Synchronized by a read lock.

Returns:
boolean true if write is successful
